part.narration: Yuki sits in the bar, alone. Enter two Demonstration Men in suits. They surround Yuki. One after the other, they speak:
part.line: Greetings, Mademoiselle
Pardon our accents; we must speak same-tongued, so you understand more clearly our offer.
Offer?
part.narration: One demoman pulls out a pristine paper printout. The other blows a note on a kazoo.Main Action is interrupting. The two recite:
part.line: The Group is Japan's largest software corporation.
We specialize in video game production and publishing.
We offer products such as Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest, Tales, Mega Man,
Mario, Zelda, Metroid, Street Fighter, Metal Gear, Pok√©mon,
Shin Megami Tensei, Ys, Gurumin, Xenosaga, Disgaea,
Onimusha, Silent Hill, Resident Evil, Beatmania, Contra, Castlevania,
Twinbee, DoDonPachi, Pac-Man, Boktai, Kirby, No More Heroes,
Atelier Iris, Lost Odyssey, Super Robot Wars—

condition.narration: One Demoman punches the other in the shoulder.

part.line: Alright, I get it, you make everything.
You're the real DOGMA.
part.narration: Others in the bar laugh and applaud for five seconds. Then they stop. The Demomen continue.
part.line: Our offer.
Become an Executive Producer for The Group.
Until I die, I'm with New PNN.
Come to us immediately with your decision!
Lest we take full legal action for your conduct on October 19, 2011.
part.narration: Yuki rubs her face.Sudden cut.At house, Yuki waits on the bed. Nozomi sifts through her closet.
part.line: Yuki, do you like this dress?
You're not wearing the dress for The Group, not for me.
Oh.
So how does it look? How do I look?
You're not wearing it for me!
I know, but please, just tell me how the dress looks!
You want to know what I think?
part.narration: Yuki rises. Yuki pulls her hands from behind her back. Before Before Yuki's Eyes — in her hands — something shiny — a gun. The world fades away — Yuki cocks the gun and points-blank at Nozomi.

condition.comment: The Player is allowed infinite time to make the decision.

choice.line: I don't care about the dress.
choice.narration: Yuki shoots her in the face. Yuki gasps, every inflection of Nozomi's voice in panic — in loss — in death — permeating her thought. Oh God. She's not alive, she's not alive —
Nozomi, holding her head, climbs back to her feet.
choice.line: You have to care. You have to care!

choice.narration: Yuki shoots her in the face. Yuki gasps, every inflection of Nozomi's voice in panic — in loss — in death — permeating her thought. Oh God. She's not alive, she's not alive —
Nozomi, holding her head, climbs back to her feet.
choice.line: This dress could be better. This dress could be better!

part.narration: Yuki cocks the gun. She points at Nozomi.

choice.line: I can't make every decision for you!
That's not what you said when you took my job!
I can't be all you have!

part.narration: Yuki cocks the gun. She points at Nozomi.
Nozomi, once stomach-first on the ground, rolls to her back. She stares upward.
part.line: You're a person, not a demographic.
part.narration: Yuki kneels by Nozomi's side. She takes her wife's hand and touches it to her cheek.
part.line: You're a person, not a parasite.
You know what I am?
I'm married.
part.narration: Nozomi sighs. Madame Soleil drops the gun.
part.line: I love Us.
